hero.title: Explore All Academic Programs at Uniprep
hero.description: Uniprep provides internationally aligned pathways for high school students, university learners, and career shifters. Each program is designed with real industry requirements.

programs.title: Foundation in Computer Science
programs.description: Core algorithms, computational thinking, and data structures for future CS undergraduates.

programs.title: Diploma in Business Analytics
programs.description: Learn analytics, advanced Excel, Python, and dashboards for data-driven decisions.

programs.title: Foundation in Economics
programs.description: Macroeconomics, microeconomics, international finance for economics majors.

programs.title: Diploma in Software Engineering
programs.description: Full-stack development, DevOps, and system design for aspiring engineers.

programs.title: Skill Track: IELTS Intensive 6.5+
programs.description: IELTS 6.5+ preparation with native speakers, weekly mock exams.

programs.title: Skill Track: UI/UX Design
programs.description: Interface design, UX research, prototyping with Figma and Framer.

programs.title: Skill Track: Python for Data Science
programs.description: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, real-world data projects.

programs.title: Skill Track: Marketing Performance Ads
programs.description: Facebook Ads, Google Ads, A/B Testing, ROI Analytics.

finalCta.title: Not sure which program fits you?
finalCta.description: Let Uniprep recommend the perfect path for your goals.
